page.title: 14VIKING SHIP HOTEL
page.content: The one and only hotel in Cliffsend is on the Main Sandwich,Ramsgate Road.It is one of the larger hotels of the area and also has a motel.There is a large dance hall. A typical advertisement for the hotel reads like this: ************************************** Spend the day at {PEGWELL BAY }and visit the: {VIKING SHIP RESTAURANT *Motel { *m/coffee { *lunches { *teas {Pegwell Bay, Ramsgate *dinners {Telephone 0843 592493 *snacks { --------------- {Facing the Viking Ship "Hugin" with { glorious views of Pegwell Bay { *FULLY LICENSED *FREE HOUSE* { *UNIQUE VIKING BAR *DANCING* {Buses pass the Motel and Restaurant
